synopsis.text: Jr.'s peaceful reign as the heir to Romana's throne is disrupted when the malevolent Star Face seeks to seize power and become the next High Official. In this futuristic world, where overpopulation has led to the colonization of Terra II, Romana is an all-male society with female androids called Marionettes serving various roles. Jr.'s loyal Saber Marionettes, Cherry and Lime, along with Bloodberry, who serves Jr.'s father, must protect Jr. from Star Face's marionettes and restore peace to Romana. In this thrilling battle for power and survival, can Jr. and his marionettes outsmart Star Face and preserve their kingdom?
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
